pages.text: $(concept)Ponder/$ is a way to view dynamic tutorials on many of the more advanced blocks and items in the game. Relevant blocks or items will contain the text "Hold W to Ponder", which will bring up the tutorial for the item. Many places in this guide will direct you to $(concept)Ponder/$ for more information. This can be done in inventory, through $(concept)EMI/$, or directly from this guide.
